name: LilyTimer
description:
Help the frog to collect all musical notes in the levels, but be careful, the lilypads won't stay forever!

Once you collect all the notes, the ancient frog door will open so you can pass to the next level.

Controls:

Arrow Keys or W/A/S/D: Move the frog.

Spacebar: Jump

Credits:

Alvaro "Bastillas" Rocuant

Felipe Jimenez

Ignacio "Gambito" Moraga

Manuel "Sanders" Yañez
